scripts.build: yarn extract && yarn merge && react-scripts build
scripts.messages:extract: i18n extract src en-US src/messages && yarn format:messages
scripts.messages:merge: i18n merge -r src/messages/en-US.json src/messages && yarn format:messages
scripts.messages:import: i18n convert -i src/phraseApp/in src/messages && i18n merge -r src/messages/en-US.json src/messages && yarn format:messages
